line.text: %Forge%: Good job. I just received word the airlift was a complete success. All the refugees were saved. None of it would have happened if you hadn't made the way safe for the Sentinels.
line.textb: %Forge%: Good job. I just received word the airlift was a complete success. All the refugees were saved. None of it would have happened if you hadn't made the way safe for the Sentinels.

line.text: %PLAYER%: We start off working with the Brotherhood and now we're helping Sentinels. Next, Senator Kelly will be inviting us to lunch.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: As if working with the X-Men was bad enough, now we're helping Sentinels. What's next? Senator Kelly inviting us to lunch?

line.text: %Forge%: Yeah, that'll be the day. At least you're finished on the platforms. I'll have Blink open up a portal to take you to the X-Mansion. When you get back stop by and see Havok.
